name: StartFire Beta Demo
description:
This is a simple demo of my first Unreal Engine "game". I was curious to see how fast I can create something out of the box. I Did that small project in one day with no experience at all with Unreal Engine software.

WARNING: This game does nothing! It's just a visual exploration I did with mesh and sound for fun. Basically when you approach a light object the sound increase or decreases... owaahh. 

Try it to see what is possible to do quickly with Unreal Engine in one day with no experiences :-P
